CmdLine: apt-get update   && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends     ca-certificates     curl   && cd /tmp   && curl -SLO https://releases.hashicorp.com/consul-template/0.19.3/consul-template_0.19.3_linux_amd64.tgz   && tar -xvf consul-template_0.19.3_linux_amd64.tgz   && chmod a+x consul-template   && mv consul-template /usr/local/bin/   && rm -rf consul-template*     && curl -SLO https://download.docker.com/linux/static/stable/x86_64/docker-17.09.0-ce.tgz   && tar -xvf docker-17.09.0-ce.tgz   && mv docker/docker /usr/local/bin/   && rm -rf docker*     && apt-get purge -y --auto-remove     ca-certificates     curl   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
